main event: A witness observed a round, flat object resembling a garbage can moving rapidly across the sky in Morgantown, West Virginia, on March 15, 1949.
interesting points: The object was yellow and left a yellow tapering trail,The object emitted a sound similar to a sky rocket,The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 seconds,The observer had a background in astronomy and was confident it wasn't an astronomical phenomenon,An additional sighting occurred on March 28, 1949, displaying a different shape and color.
sighted object: round flat yellow object resembling a garbage can
witness description: A local businessman with an interest in astronomy, who reported multiple similar sightings.
